oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All I Ask If You're My Friend performance
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of All I Ask If You're My Friend, written by Floyd Huddleston, and performed by an unidentified male voice with piano accompaniment. Recording is most likely a demo performance.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) [Unidentified] performs "All I Ask If You're My Friend"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Huddleston, Floyd, 1918-1991
